item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping on corner of road every day, 26th July
item.description:
Fly tipping here on an almost daily basis, despite Lewisham council putting warning sign (no fly tipping, penalty etc). Some smaller items of the fly tipping has been from occupants of nearby flats, perhaps they don't have adequate bin and recycling options, or information. Some items have dangerous big chunks of broken MDF/metal parts of sofas with sharp ends sticking out. Many boys pass this spot on way to Forest Hill Boys school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wynell Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter at bus shelter, continuing to roundabout, 26th July
item.description:
Hayes Lane near junction Whitecroft Way, bus shelter PT, litter front & back of shelter continuing to Park Langley roundabout including grass verges. Please remove all litter. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45d, Hayes Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Screws sticking out and missing boards, 26th July
item.description:
Very dangerous for playground. No boards and screws sticky out at toddler head height

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Nuisance from neighbour on park, 26th July
item.description:
A man approached me whilst I sitting on a bench on the Barnehurst open space. He told me that the bench was being used by drug users and that he has petitioned for it to be removed. I did not welcome this conversation but he persisted with it. I’m now uncomfortable using that bench in future as I think he watches it from his house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Claremont Road, London

item.title: Blocked drain on highway opposite entrance to 72/74 Camberwell Road, 26th July
item.description:
Blocked drain on Camberwell Road in the bus lane opposite entrance to 72/74..causes severe flooding on the road and into our drive...pulls down the gravel and dloids the road so pedestrians cannot use the pavements.danferoys for cyclists been like this for weeks/months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of scrap rubbish in the car park, 26th July
item.description:
There has been a large amount of fly tipping left in the communal grounds of Shrubsall close, the bags were thrown down and busted open. Everything from food take away bags to old dirty duvets. The lady left behind loads of documents connecting her to the crime. Car registration plate tickets & also packages with name and address still on it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shrubsall Close, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping & Rubbish Rushgrove street, 26th July
item.description:
A huge tree like decoration with attached lights has been dumped on the pavement. Alongside a a child’s scooter and plastic sheeting. There is also rubbish discarded along the street from cars that park up and throw their rubbish out the window., street does not have bins so this problem is getting out of hand

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whetstone Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste dumped, 26th July
item.description:
A huge amount of dog waste has been dumped along the entrance to the park, it’s causing flys and rats to now infest the area this is an on going problem and seems to be a continuous dumping ground for someone accumulating a lot of dog waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Pleasant Walk, Coldblow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress dumped outside our property, 26th July
item.description:
A mattress has been left outside our property for 2 weeks now. It has been dumped at the end of the road on the pavement, leaning up against the back wall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rye Hill Park, Nunhead, London
